comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Attached a patch with the required changes to jackrabbit-site (except new logo images). The new skin can be seen at http://people.apache.org/~jukka/2007/JCR-1236/

If you like it, I'll commit the changes in a few days.

comments.author: Christoph Kiehl
comments.body: What's the reason for changing the skin? I like the old one better than the new one.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: There's no need to change if people prefer the current look.

comments.author: Stefan Guggisberg
comments.body: +1 for the change, i prefer the new design

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: The Confluence export uses the new skin with some modifications. Resolving as Fixed.

description:
Some time ago Michael Eppelheimer from Day created a new skin for the Jackrabbit web site, and I've now streamlined it a bit and integrated it with the Maven site build mechanism.

The templates should be easy to adapt also for Confluence when we get around to that migration.
